title: Ep 51: Staycation All I Ever Wanted with Regina Merson
itunes:title: Ep 51: Staycation All I Ever Wanted with Regina Merson
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kate deals with depression and has a NSFW shower routine question, while Doree struggles with feeling friendless. They also discuss their dream staycations, share affordable ways to relax without leaving your hometown, and hear from several ...
description:
This week, Kate deals with depression and has a NSFW shower routine question, while Doree struggles with feeling friendless. They also discuss their dream staycations, share affordable ways to relax without leaving your hometown, and hear from several listeners about their own staycation plans.

Then they welcome Regina Merson, founder of Reina Rebelde, a makeup line created by and for Latina women. She discusses walking away from her career as a bankruptcy attorney, turning a makeup obsession into a full-time job, how journaling gets her out of her own head, and what it means to be a “rebel queen.”

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast, @katespencer, @doree, Twitter: @forever35pod, and in ourFacebook group (password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website, Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • RobinHood - Sign up at forever35.robinhood.com to get a free stock.
  • Lightbox - Visit lightboxjewlery.com/forever35.
  • ThirdLove - Visit thirdlove.com/forever for 15% off your first purchase.
  • LiquidIV - Get 20% off anything you order at liquid-IV.com with promo code forever35.
  • The Citizenry - To receive a $50 gift voucher to use toward your first purchase of $200 or more, visit citizenrypodcast.com/forever35 and use promo code forever35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
